last_episode_to_air.name: Never a Dull Moment
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Garcias ready for Ray and Sonia's vow renewal, George and Carlos stumble upon new career opportunities.

name: The Garcias
overview: After 15 years, the Garcia kids are grown up and now have children of their own. The new extended Garcia family travels to the beautiful Riviera Maya in Mexico, a place full of self-discovery, where they will all learn what it really takes to be a “familia.”

episodes.name: Helicopter Dads
episodes.overview: The Garcias get ready to kick off a summer to remember at a beach house in the Riviera Maya.

episodes.name: The Compromise
episodes.overview: The Garcias struggle to adapt to life under one roof.

episodes.name: Sonia's Secret
episodes.overview: While Sonia seizes a fresh opportunity, Victoria takes a stand, and Max falls in love.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner
episodes.overview: Yunjin's mother Li Lin upends life at Casa Garcia. Lorena gets a taste of the limelight, while Carlos and George prepare for their club opening.

episodes.name: Just Trying to Help
episodes.overview: Andrea recruits her family to help a local boy who is going blind.

episodes.name: Hurricane Schmurricane
episodes.overview: When the Wi-Fi goes out, the Garcias must find new ways to bond at home.

episodes.name: Two Peas in a Chultun
episodes.overview: As Ray's literary career takes off, Max and Andrea have a cook-off, while George and Carlos continue to feud.

episodes.name: Truth Hurts
episodes.overview: Sonia and Ray try to reignite their passion. While Ana finds a new crowd, Lorena tries her hand at business.

episodes.name: Back to the Roots
episodes.overview: While George and Carlos go to great lengths to make amends, Ana gets protective of her new "bestie."

episodes.name: Never a Dull Moment
episodes.overview: As the Garcias ready for Ray and Sonia's vow renewal, George and Carlos stumble upon new career opportunities.
